subject: 6+R Shifter
description_text:
Hello,

Can you tell me how the 6+R shifter mounts? Are there mounting holes in the bottom? If so, what are the dimension of the holes? Can you provide a picture of the bottom of the shifter?

Thanks,

Jeff Sparks

conversations.body_text: Hi captain. sparks@comcast. net,  Which shifter model did you purchase? Please provide a picture of the shifter and the position of your mounting bracket. The shifter can be fixed by screwing upwards from the bottom plate.

I have not yet purchased a shifter. I'm considering the 6+R shifter but want to know what options there are for mounting it. I'm asking for a picture of the bottom of the shifter or the dimensions of the holes in the bottom plate.

Thank you.

Jeff Sparks
________________________________

Hi captain. sparks@comcast. net,     Here are the bottom view and dimensions of the 6+R shifter. You can refer to the link for more detailed information.       https://www.simsonn.com/products/simsonn-racing-simulator-hexagonal-shifter

Thank you . This is the information that I was looking for. However, the link doesn't tell me what the two silver buttons on the shifter are for.
 Can you tell me what they do?
Thanks.

________________________________
Hi captain. sparks@comcast. net,  These two buttons are used for high/low gear shifting in American Truck Simulator and Euro Truck Simulator.
